Articles.Content: I heard on the 24-hour KSP twitch stream that there was a download for overhauled 1.25 m. parts in the devs. Anyone have a location? Or a link? Or anything???
Thanks. Let's keep this topic open for everyone else who wants to download these awesome parts.

It would also be nice to have a recap of exactly how they are to be installed and the correct settings required in a career startup to expose the upgradeability elements.

Sorry - It appears the full documentation is available and easily obtained by skimming through the part configs and applying one's understanding of config  syntax and KSP coding standards.

 

Edited September 15, 2016 by Wallygator
